title: U.S. college students average study hours , by major 2011
yAxis: Number of hours spent studying per week
summary: This bar chart has 29 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Number of hours spent studying per week in each Month on the y axis.
The Number of hours spent studying per week is appeared to be the highest at Month Architecture and lowest at Month Speech.
The maximum Month Architecture has got 2.19 times higher Number of hours spent studying per week than the minimum Month Speech.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of hours spent studying per week for 29 number of Months.
Month Architecture has the highest Number of hours spent studying per week and Speech has the lowest Number of hours spent studying per week.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 29 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Number of hours spent studying per week in each Month on the y axis.
The Number of hours spent studying per week is appeared to be the highest at Month Architecture and lowest at Month Speech.
The maximum Month Architecture has got 2.19 times higher Number of hours spent studying per week than the minimum Month Speech.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Number of hours spent studying per week in the y axis.
The Number of hours spent studying per week is appeared to be the highest at Month Architecture and lowest at Month Speech.
The Number of hours spent studying per week of Month Speech is 2.19% smaller than the maximum value at Architecture.
Number of hours spent studying per week at Month Architecture is 23.7 , second place is Chemical Engineering at 21.6, and thirdly is Physics at 19.7.
Overall Number of hours spent studying per week has decreased over the Months.
Month Theater, and Anthropology have a similar Number of hours spent studying per week that is 16.0.
The average Number of hours spent studying per week in all 29 Months is 15.47.
